divs: sighting details i was in maine taking photographs of a house i ambuying. i had the impression that there were objects flying above, but i did nothave my glasses on, and dont really know. i had 27 photographs developed. inone of the photos it shows an obect above the tree line. it appeared to havebeen loosing altitude. it was whitish in color and had red and whire lightsbelowalmost looks like an inflatable rubber raft, but in the air. a socond object ismuch higher up, leaving a contrail behind, but making a very sharp (u-turn) turnin the sky. i had the images enlarged several times over and the colors andshape can be clearly seen in the first. in the second the shape is not seen butthe contrail seems to envelope the craft\ufo (unlike a jet airplane). thereseems to be some sort of disturbance\trail behind the first object that lookslike its decending in altitude. i also have the negatives to the photographs.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Columbia Falls
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: photos taken of my new home in Maine shows things
